1.zh_cn_content: 哎呀，仓库都放满啦！该整理一下，或者扩建了哦~

2.zh_cn_content: <font size='12'>6月27日活动公告：</font>\n  <font color="#FF0000">一.超级偶像</font>\n    玩家可从主界面超级偶像入口进入该活动，对自己心仪的偶像投票!

3.zh_cn_content: ID为{0}的玩家没有响应您的邀请哦，重新发送试试看吧！
3.en_content: Player {0} didn't respond your invitation, try resend it~

4.zh_cn_content: 因为等待时间太久，客户已经取消订单了…下次注意不要超过时间了哦！
4.en_content: Your order is overdue, please withdraw your items

5.zh_cn_content: 兑换码已经成功兑换啦，快去确认奖品吧~
5.en_content: You've redeemed the key, please check your rewards!

6.zh_cn_content: 有未领取的任务奖励哦，别忘了去收取一下呢！
6.en_content: You have unclaimed quest rewards, go check it out!

7.zh_cn_content: 您的合作伙伴{0}向您赠送了一笔{1}，快去看看吧~
7.en_content: Your cooperator {0} sent you {1}, go check it out!

8.zh_cn_content: 懂得合作是获得成功的重要因素哦，恭喜你找到了自己的合作伙伴~
8.en_content: Congrats on finding a cooperator, here's rewards for you!

9.zh_cn_content: 找到好的合作伙伴就像找到合适的舞伴一样~ 以后也要一起加油呀！
9.en_content: A right partner is valuable both in business and dance! Congrats to you~

10.zh_cn_content: 这是您删除的订单中已经装箱的道具，别忘了把它们收回仓库喔~
10.en_content: These are items recovered from deleted orders, don't forget to put them back into your warehouse~

11.zh_cn_content: 这是您之前忘记领取的奖励，请注意查收
11.en_content: You have unclaimed rewards, go check it out!

12.zh_cn_content: 这是您之前忘记领取的日程任务奖励，请注意查收
12.en_content: You have unclaimed  task rewards, go check it out!

13.zh_cn_content: 这是您之前忘记领取的奖杯礼包，请注意查收
13.en_content: You have unclaimed  trophy gift, go check it out!

14.zh_cn_content: 这是您之前忘记领取的周积分奖励，请注意查收
14.en_content: You have unclaimed weekly point rewards, go check it out!
